itunes:title: Episode 755 - Special Guest “Squirrely Dan” Trevor Wilson of 'Letterkenny'
title: Episode 755 - Special Guest “Squirrely Dan” Trevor Wilson of 'Letterkenny'
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by ‘Letterkenny’ star K. Trevor Wilson to talk about how he got on ‘Letterkenny’, how the show ‘Letterkenny’ started and how the Canadian and U.S. military helped make it huge, fans constantly saying “buttshole”...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by ‘Letterkenny’ star K. Trevor Wilson to talk about how he got on ‘Letterkenny’, how the show ‘Letterkenny’ started and how the Canadian and U.S. military helped make it huge, fans constantly saying “buttshole” to him in real life and how the joke was born. #letterkenny #pitterpatter #tobefair #squirellydan
